DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to test the safety & efficacy of aripiprazole in patients with Bipolar Mania for a period of at least 12 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Aripiprazole in Patients With Acute Mania
DOC.criteria: Primary diagnosis of Acute Bipolar I Mania Patients with a DSMIV diagnosis other than Bipolar I Mania
